trans-unit.source: Defines size-related attributes of a cached bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 定义与大小相关的缓存的位图图像的属性。

trans-unit.source: A bitmap is scaled based on values that are defined by this class.
trans-unit.target: 此类定义的值根据缩放位图。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> with empty sizing properties.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>具有空的大小调整属性。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>将具有其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>设置为`true`，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>设置为零，并将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>设置为零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: When passed to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>, the input is the same as the output.
trans-unit.target: 在传递给<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>，输入是输出相同。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TransformedBitmap>

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>保留了源位图纵横比，并且指定初始<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight*>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to zero.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>将具有其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>设置为`true`，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>设置的值为`pixelHeight`，并将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>设置为零。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，生成的位图的高度。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 发生时 pixelHeight 小于零。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"></xref> to apply.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>保留了源位图纵横比，并且指定初始<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation"></xref>应用。

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap maintains its original aspect ratio and sizing.
trans-unit.target: 生成的位图保留其原始的纵横比和大小。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to the value of `rotation`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to 0, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to 0.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>将具有其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>属性设置的值为`rotation`，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>设置为`true`，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>设置为 0，并将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>设置为 0。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The initial rotation value to apply.
trans-unit.target: 要应用的初始旋转值。

trans-unit.source: Only 90 degree increments are supported.
trans-unit.target: 支持唯一 90 度的增量。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that preserves the aspect ratio of the source bitmap and specifies an initial <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>保留了源位图纵横比，并且指定初始<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth*>

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `true`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to zero, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>将具有其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>设置为`true`，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>设置为零，并将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>设置的值为`pixelWidth`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，生成的位图的宽度。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelWidth is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 发生时 pixelWidth 小于零。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref> that does not preserve the original bitmap aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>不保留原始位图纵横比。

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap has an effective size of `pixelHeight` × `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 生成的位图大小都有一个有效的`pixelHeight`× `pixelWidth`。

trans-unit.source: The returned <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions> will have its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> set to `false`, its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> set to the value of `pixelHeight`, and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> set to the value of `pixelWidth`.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>将具有其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A>设置为`false`，将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>设置的值为`pixelHeight`，并将其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A>设置的值为`pixelWidth`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource.PixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PreservesAspectRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.Rotation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，生成的位图的宽度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the resulting bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，生成的位图的高度。

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when pixelHeight is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: 发生时 pixelHeight 小于零。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，位图图像的高度。

trans-unit.source: PixelHeight must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelHeight 必须是大于零才能有效。

trans-unit.source: The height of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 位图的高度。

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: 以像素为单位，位图图像的宽度。

trans-unit.source: PixelWidth must be greater than zero to be valid.
trans-unit.target: PixelWidth 必须是大于零才能有效。

trans-unit.source: The width of the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 位图的宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether the aspect ratio of the original bitmap image is preserved.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，确定是否保留原始位图图像的纵横比。

trans-unit.source: If the original aspect ratio is preserved, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> represent the maximum size values for the bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 如果保留了原始的纵横比，<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>表示位图的最大大小值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The resulting bitmap is only guaranteed to have either its width or its height match the specified values.
trans-unit.target: 生成的位图只能保证其宽度或高度匹配的指定的值。

trans-unit.source: If the aspect ratio is not preserved, the specified <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> are both used, and the bitmap is stretched to use those values.
trans-unit.target: 如果不保持纵横比，指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A>在同时使用，并且位图拉伸以使用这些值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSizeOptions.PixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the original aspect ratio is maintained; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果维持原始的纵横比;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the rotation angle that is applied to a bitmap.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，表示应用于位图的旋转角度。

trans-unit.source: Only increments of 90 degrees are supported.
trans-unit.target: 支持仅为 90 度的增量。

trans-unit.source: The rotation angle that is applied to the image.
trans-unit.target: 应用于映像的旋转角度。
